comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Cecil Peoli, early aviator, died in a crash in Maryland, 1915--see Early Aviators. Seems likely he is shown here with the Baldwin Red Devil airplane--the diagram looks close, if not identical, to the photo above.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cecil_Peoli

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Cecil Peoli  Aero Club of America Pilot# 141 June 22,1912  Baldwin biplane Mineola, Long Island , New York.
Peoli was a student of Thomas Baldwin  Aero Club of America Pilot # 7
